Title: Relates to standards for the erection of tents or membrane structures
Summary: Relates to standards for the erection of tents or membrane structures; requires standards permitting restaurants and establishments licensed to sell alcoholic beverages at retail for consumption on the premises to erect such structures for more than 180 days provided the local municipality permits such use.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to standards for the erection of tents or membrane structures
